lead_paragraph: San Diego Chargers defensive end Igor Olshansky will miss tomorrow’s home opener against the Tennessee Titans because of a sprained left knee. Olshansky was injured early in Monday night’s 27-0 win against the Oakland Raiders. Olshansky said he could return for San Diego’s game at Baltimore on Oct. 1.
